content:
{"name": "Northern Lakes Seafood & Meats", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Northern Lakes Seafood & Meats is the leading wholesale supplier of fresh and frozen seafood and meats.
Northern Lakes has a variety of types which they source from all over the world.
Quality is always important and to ensure it, they will always try to provide the best product for you.
You will be pleased to know that they are HACCP and USDA certified, which is proof of their quality and high standards.
NSF-Cook & Thurber Company (a global provider of quality and safety audits for foods) gives them more than 95 percent rating for their seafood and meat items during food audits.
They are always looking for new opportunities to provide customers with fish, seafood and meat that meet demand.
They also offer state-of-the-art food packaging to ensure the best quality of seafood.
For more information, please call them.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.northernlakesfoods.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "12301 Conant", "address_2": null, "city": "Campau/Banglatown", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48212", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.409793, "longitude": -83.0578615}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 368-2500", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "09:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "09:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "09:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "09:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "09:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}]}
